paper_abstract: A new procedure for finding exact travelling wave solutions to the modified Camassa-Holm and Degasperis-Procesi equations is proposed. it turns Out that many new solutions are obtained. Furthermore, these solutions are in general forms, and many known solutions to these two equations are only special cases of them. (C) 2009 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: New travelling wave solutions to modified CH and DP equations
